name: MyCalibrePlayer
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my calibre player
des:
Calibre Audio is a UK based charity providing audiobooks to people with various challenges; including sight loss, dyslexia and various physical disabilities that make reading a printed book difficult. For more information, please visit: calibreaudio.org.uk/services

My Calibre Player allows Calibre members to play their favourite audiobooks from their Alexa device. 

The skill has basic functionality; allowing you to play an audiobook, pause, skip forwards and backwards, set a sleep timer, and bookmark. To search for books or browse our collection, please visit my.calibre.org.uk to add titles and manage your playlist before using the skill.

To get started, say “Alexa, open My Calibre Player”. Please make sure your pronunciation is clear. We recommend you emphasise the words “my – kal – uh – buh player” to avoid Alexa opening a different skill, such as your calendar.

You’ll hear a jingle signifying that the skill has launched. Alexa will ask if you want to continue listening to your current book. If you say “Yes” it’ll play that book from the beginning or last known bookmark. 

If you say “No” Alexa will list the other titles in your current playlist. You can choose another title by stating the book name and it’ll begin playing that title from the beginning or last known bookmark. 


Once your audiobook begins playing, you’ll be able to use commands such as “Alexa, pause/skip or skip forward/go back” to navigate through the tracks. 

 

You can also set a sleep timer by saying "Alexa, sleep timer for X minutes" during playback. A bookmark will be placed once Alexa closes.

When you’ve finished listening, say "Alexa, stop" or "Alexa, exit" and this will close the skill and place a bookmark where you stop.


If you wish to continue directly after closing, say "Alexa, keep reading/listening".

Questions and Support

If you have any questions or require further help, please contact our team by emailing membershipservices@calibre.org.uk, calling 01296 432339 or head to my.calibre.org.uk and submit a form by clicking on the green bug icon.
